references.paper_title: From block-toeplitz matrices to differential equations on graphs: towards a general theory for scalable masked transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces Topological Vision Transformers, a key application of the proposed Fast Tree-Field Integrators.

references.paper_title: A new scaling and squaring algorithm for the matrix exponential
references.reason: This paper presents a fundamental algorithm for matrix exponentials, which is relevant to the efficient computation of F-distance matrices.

references.paper_title: On approximating arbitrary metrics by tree metrics
references.reason: This foundational paper provides theoretical groundwork for approximating general graph metrics with tree metrics, a key step in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Learning compressed transforms with low displacement rank
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of low displacement rank matrices, a crucial element in the efficiency of the proposed Fast Tree-Field Integrators.

references.paper_title: Nearly-linear time algorithms for preconditioning and solving symmetric, diagonally dominant linear systems
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational algorithm for solving linear systems, a relevant sub-problem in the computation of graph metrics.
